title: MiniChess 5x5
smallDes: A 5x5 chess variant with unique piece movements, encouraging dynamic gameplay.
largeDes: A 5x5 chess variant where players use three distinct pieces with unique movements, reimagining chess tactics on a smaller board. This simplified setup offers strategic, fast-paced, and dynamic gameplay.

title: Track Status
smallDes: A Streamlit app for analyzing student records and placement statistics (VIT specific).
largeDes: A web app built using Streamlit to analyze student records and placement data. It provides insights like company wise placement counts and package categorization.

title: Enliven
smallDes: A platform providing resources and support for domestic workers facing abuse and partiality.
largeDes: Enliven is a platform offering support for domestic workers facing abuse. It connects users with NGOs for legal help, provides information on laws, and offers a safe space to share experiences.

title: Glorhea
smallDes: A 2D platformer game combining action and strategy for an engaging experience.
largeDes: Glorhea is a 2D platformer game where players take on the role of a warrior fighting to save his people. Combining action and strategy, it offers a thrilling and immersive gaming experience for users.

title: Rust Quiz
smallDes: A Rust quiz app to test and improve programming knowledge with fun questions.
largeDes: The Rust Quiz app is designed to test and improve Rust programming knowledge. It features interactive questions, offering a fun and efficient way to enhance your skills through engaging quizzes.

title: Binary Tree
smallDes: An app to create and visualize binary trees easily for problem-solving specially GFG.
largeDes: An intuitive app that simplifies creating and visualizing binary trees. Designed for problem-solving, it assists users in understanding and solving binary tree-related questions with ease and efficiency.
